title: Mailbird v2.3.30.0
description:
Mailbird v2.3.30.0

Version 2.3.30.0 - September 16, 2016
â€¢	Added F1 keyboard shortcut to show support window.
â€¢	Added support for showing inline UUE attachments in messages if using IMAP.
â€¢	Improved conversation grouping to group messages from Nextdoor and other similar websites correctly.
â€¢	Improvedavatar search detection.
â€¢	Improved drag and drop email function.
â€¢	Fixed remove conversations from search results when deleted from another folder.
â€¢	Fixed issue with conversations and messages showing embedded/inline attachments as regular attachments for a few seconds before the message body is downloaded.
â€¢	Fixed issue where the SMTP details of a primary identity could be invisible, preventing sending from that identity.
â€¢	Fixed issue where new message button is visible when there are more than 1 selected messages.
â€¢	Fixed issue when sometimes the referral is crashing.
â€¢	Fixed issue with the inline data remaining visible in the body if using POP3.
â€¢	Apps: Fixed issue in Chrome app when fails to navigate to home from a non bookmarked website.

The Outlook Killer
Get Mailbird, the Best Email Client for Windows
Multi-account (Supports IMAP & POP3)
Complete touch support
Integrated messaging apps
Integrated task management apps
Unified Email Inbox
Supports 17 languages
Integrated calendar apps
Customization (Colors & layout)

Official Website: https://www.getmailbird.com/
